comments.body: Why do these options use dashes instead of underscores?
Because it uses the same attribute syntax that the device (fortigate) being handled provides in order to avoid creating different names.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +79,83 @@                    - present
                    - absent
            add-header-x-forwarded-proto:
                description:
                    - Enable/disable adding an X-Forwarded-Proto header to forwarded requests.
